entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:26 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:26 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:26 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
